Articles.Content: Yo kids so I hate to be "that guy" but could anybody tell me a) how big in pixels the ideal cover photo size is? and, b] where do I go to add a signature to my posts? I've been looking through my profile settings and I've not seen it... Any help gratefully received guys, thanks x

The cover photo is something like 280 pixels tall, though you can upload bigger pictures and slide it around. The real answer is that there isn't a set size. Because it'll dynamically reshape how much is shown based on the dimensions of the user's browser.

Signature is under "Account Settings" and not in profile. There's a list of five or so buttons across the top and the far right one is "Signature". Unfortunately, it doesn't really give you any idea how big the sig is, so you have to sort of play around with it a bit. I recommend having another page open with a post of yours that you can refresh (such as this topic) so that you can see how it aligns.
